item.title: @KordingLab @ISDedal @OpenAI The question for us is: does *me* buying a product tend to make that company do more or less bad things. My guess is: it makes them do more of what they were doing that led them to get me as a customer. So, if that was bad, then I'm increasing the likelihood of them doing more.
